scripts.dev: cd packages/website && npm run dev # TODO: Also run watch on runtime and wasi
scripts.publish: npm run build && npx lerna publish
scripts.build:docs:wasi: npm run build:docs --workspace=@runno/wasi && rm -rf packages/website/docs/wasi && mkdir -p packages/website/docs && cp -R packages/wasi/docs packages/website/docs/wasi
scripts.build:docs:runtime: npm run build:docs --workspace=@runno/runtime && rm -rf packages/website/docs/runtime && mkdir -p packages/website/docs && cp -R packages/runtime/docs packages/website/docs/runtime
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs:runtime && npm run build:docs:wasi
scripts.build:sandbox: npm run bootstrap:sandbox && cd sandbox && hatch build
scripts.build:nodesandbox: cd packages/sandbox && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:wasi && npm run build:runtime && npm run build:docs && npm run build:website && npm run build:sandbox && npm run build:nodesandbox
scripts.build:deploy: npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.test:sandbox:hatch: cd sandbox && hatch build && hatch test
scripts.test:sandbox: npm run test:sandbox:deno && npm run test:sandbox:hatch
scripts.test:wasi: cd packages/wasi && npm run test:prepare && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test:wasi && npm run test:runtime && npm run test:sandbox && npm run test:nodesandbox
